mappers.update: update ${com.seeyon.apps.kdXdtzXc.po.CwOrgInfo} set [财务机构代码]=?,[财务机构名称]=?,[修改时间]=SYSDATE where id=?
mappers.select: SELECT t.id as id, t.[财务机构代码] as cwjgdm, t.[财务机构名称] as cwjgmc, t.[OA机构ID] as oajg_id, t.[OA机构代码] as oajgdm, t.[OA机构名称] as oajgmc, t.[新增时间] as insertTime, t.[修改时间] as updateTime FROM ${com.seeyon.apps.kdXdtzXc.po.CwOrgInfo} t where t.[财务机构代码]=?
